lead_paragraph: Michal Neuvirth made a playoff career-high 44 saves and Ryan White scored a second-period goal that deflected off the skate of a defenseman as the Philadelphia Flyers stayed alive in their first-round series against the Washington Capitals with a 2-0 victory Friday.

headline.print_headline: Flyers Still Alive With Game Five Win Over Caps
headline.main: Flyers Still Alive With Game Five Win Over Caps
